headline: Mosaic Announces Quarterly Dividend of $0.22 Per Share
summary: TAMPA, FL / ACCESS Newswire / November 17, 2025 / The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.22 per share on the Company's common stock. The dividend will be paid on December 18, 2025, ...
